login.signup_tooltip: Click on the « Signup » button to create a new user account.

signup.title: Signup to Signa
signup.mail_help: The email address will be used for account validation and as a recipient of authorized messages. It will remain private and will never be communicated to third parties.
signup.login_help: The login will only be used for the connection to Signa and will remain private.
signup.password_help: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter <u>and</u> one number, without spaces or special characters. It will be stored and processed using a secure encryption algorithm.
